original_text: Five cubits was the length of one wing of the cherub, and five cubits the length of the other wing of the cherub; it was ten cubits from the tip of one wing to the tip of the other.
korean_text: 한 그룹의 이쪽 날개도 다섯 규빗이요 저쪽 날개도 다섯 규빗이니 이쪽 날개 끝으로부터 저쪽 날개 끝까지 십 규빗이며

sentences.original_text: Five cubits was the length of one wing of the cherub
sentences.korean_translation: 그룹의 한쪽 날개의 길이는 다섯 규빗이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and five cubits the length of the other wing of the cherub
sentences.korean_translation: 그룹의 다른 쪽 날개의 길이도 다섯 규빗이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: it was ten cubits from the tip of one wing to the tip of the other
sentences.korean_translation: 한쪽 날개 끝에서 다른 쪽 날개 끝까지는 열 규빗이었습니다.
